Hi Lumens,

 This year, we‚Äôre excited to grow our work through video interviews with experts in the field, a growing collection of articles from our writers, magazines that centralizes the articles and graphic designs, and our flagship AI Ethics Conference, reimagined and expanded from our original hackathon format.
